item.description:
Hello All,

If you ever liked comic books, batman, superman or any of the other movies, any kind of pop culture at all you will not want to miss this show. The line up is incredible! Mark your calendars now!

POP Euphoria!
Curated by: Veronica Hebard
The Aurora Gallery | Worcester, MA
ARTSWorcester
Aurora Gallery
660 Main Street
Worcester, MA 01610

Free

Come to the opening reception SATURDAY, DECEMBER 6th 6 - 9pm!

POP Euphoria! is an international art exhibition to benefit Toys for Tots!
Featuring
• silk screens
• designer vinyl toys
• fine art + progressive illustration
• installation art and even a giant kaiju suit, or two

Check out
• new art + toys from KAIJU BIG BATTEL
• a Batman cowl worn by ADAM WEST on the 1966 TV Show
• DR. MEGO [Cartoon Network's ROBOT CHICKEN]
• new paintings by Liz Artinian [The Venture Brothers]
• new collaborations from Mark Millar and Dave Franzese
• 32 pages of the PHANTOM original comic art from Sweden
• prints by Matt Furie
• + a lot more!

Admission is free, but please consider bringing a new, unwrapped toy for Toys for Tots!

A portion of all proceeds go directly to Toys for Tots!
• www.moduslotus.com
• www.artsworcester.org
• www.toysfortots.org


© Veronica Hebard 2008

Some of the ARTISTS:
Liz Artinian
Dr. Mego
Kaiju Big Battel
Rey Ortega
Andy Fish
Rosemary Travale
Dave Franzese
Christina Ung
Matt Furie
Alexei Vella

Description:

Opening: 
December 6th 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM
Runs:
December 6th - January 10th, 2009

Pop Euphoria brings together art of different cultures, toys, fairytales, icons, and ephemera that inspire and move us. Contemporary Illustration is now blurring the lines between commercialism and fine art. Pop Euphoria will feature progressive illustrators; many of whom are premiering new works for the exhibition and showcases a variety of work never previously exhibited in Worcester or Boston. Many works for sale. Proceeds from catalogue goes to Sherry's House and Toys for Tots. ARTSWorcester will be a drop off point for Toys for Tots in December.

More Information:
E-mail: info@artsworcester.org
Entered by: ARTSWorcester

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: POP Euphoria!- Must See Show!
